title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: How are the ownership and utilization methods of Academia Sinica’s scientific and technological research and development results mainly stipulated?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: This regulation mainly describes how Academia Sinica manages their budget and revenue for technological research and development. They are regulated in accordance with Articles 6 and 13 of the Basic Law of Science and Technology. This can mainly discusses how to use scientific research results and benefits fairly and effectively, taking into account the nature of the research, application potential, social welfare, national security and impact on the market. In addition to needing to be allocated to the National Science and Technology Development Fund, the research results and income of Academia Sinica will remain within Academia Sinica and then be allocated to scientific research funds in a manner similar to the budget of affiliated units.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: What does the "principle of fairness and efficiency" mentioned in the Basic Law of Science and Technology mean?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: The concept of "principle of fairness and efficiency" means that in the process of attribution and application of research and development results and their income, the proportion of capital and labor invested and the contribution to the overall research must be taken into consideration, as well as the nature of the scientific and technological research results. , application potential, social welfare, national security and impact on the market. It means that when dealing with these issues, we must do it fairly and in the interests of all parties.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: Does this method stipulate the income distribution method of results?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, the measures mention that the attribution and use of results and their income should be based on the principles of fairness and efficiency, taking into account the proportion and contribution of capital and labor services. At the same time, measures for profit distribution, avoidance and other matters shall be uniformly planned and formulated by the Executive Yuan. The part belonging to the Academia Sinica can be allocated to the scientific research fund according to the budget of the affiliated unit.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: Does this measure involve the management of intellectual property rights?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, this method is to effectively manage the scientific and technological research and development conducted by the Academia Sinica, including the intellectual property rights and income from the results.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: How to ensure that the results of scientific and technological research and development can contribute to social welfare or national security?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: According to Article 6, Paragraph 3 of the Basic Law of Science and Technology, the nature, application potential, impact on social welfare and national security of scientific and technological research and development results, and their impact on the market must be considered. These are all planned and formulated by the Executive Yuan. In other words, the purpose, requirements, deadline, scope, proportion, management methods, etc. of these achievements must be reviewed and planned by the Executive Yuan to ensure that they can contribute to social welfare or national security. In addition, each competent authority may also formulate relevant laws and regulations to implement this provision.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: What are the relevant regulations that different competent authorities need to follow when implementing this measure?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: When implementing this measure, the relevant regulations that different competent authorities need to follow include Article 6, paragraph 3, and Article 13, paragraph 4, of the Basic Law of Science and Technology, as well as the regulations on the ownership and use of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica. Regulations.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: Part of Academia Sinica’s research and development results and its income must be allocated to the National Science and Technology Development Fund. So what should be done with the remaining part?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: The remaining part will belong to Academia Sinica itself. They will follow corresponding regulations and use the money for scientific research and development. This also includes the management and application of their own intellectual property rights, as well as other income from research and development.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: What does "Measures for the Attribution and Utilization of Academia Sinica's Scientific and Technological Research and Development Results" refer to?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: "Methods for the Attribution and Utilization of Academia Sinica's Scientific and Technological Research and Development Results" refers to the various knowledge, technologies, and works produced by Academia Sinica personnel as a result of their work, as well as the products, integrated circuit layouts, computer software, and commercial products produced within the academy. Confidentiality, professional knowledge and other technical data, as well as domestic and foreign patent rights obtained thereby, publications of Academia Sinica, and other intellectual property rights and all derivative rights. It is also responsible for managing and utilizing these R&D results, including related consultation, consultation, review, application, revenue, utilization, technology transfer, use authorization, appointment, trust, litigation consultation, maintenance, etc. The management and utilization methods of Academia Sinica’s publications are separately formulated. As for integrated circuit structures, computer software and derivative works such as manuals and instructions, they are handled according to this method. Intellectual property rights donated or hosted by Academia Sinica will also be handled according to this method.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: What exactly does the "research and development results" in this approach include?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: The "research and development results" in this method include the knowledge, technology, works produced by the work of Academia Sinica personnel and the products produced in the institute. Also includes integrated circuit layout, computer software, trade secrets, professional knowledge and other technical information. In addition, domestic and foreign patent rights, publications of Academia Sinica, other intellectual property rights and all derivative rights obtained by them are also included.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica

2787-2554

answer: There are many different processes for the management and use of R&D results, including negotiation, consultation, review, application, income, utilization, technology transfer, use authorization, appointment, trust, litigation consultation, maintenance, and related to the rights of R&D results. Other related matters.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: How are the "Academia Sinica publications" mentioned in the measures managed and used?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: The method does not specifically mention how "Academia Sinica Publications" will be managed and used, only that the details in this regard will be defined separately. However, if such publications are related to integrated circuit layouts, computer software and derivative works such as manuals and instructions, they will be handled in accordance with the provisions of this method.

answer: The Research and Management Committee of Academia Sinica is mainly responsible for deliberating some important issues, including: first, the transfer of Academia Sinica’s exclusive technology to areas outside Taiwan; second, the free technology transfer of Academia Sinica; third, the decision of Academia Sinica to abandon or transfer intellectual property rights; Fourth, the transfer of intellectual property rights by Academia Sinica; fifth, Academia Sinica’s decision on trademark application and trademark commercial authorization. If there is a violation of these regulations, the Research and Management Committee will also conduct an investigation and then refer it to the relevant units for handling.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: If I am an employee of Academia Sinica, who will own the research results?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: If you are an employee of Academia Sinica, the ownership of R&D results may be in two situations. One is that if your research work is budgeted, commissioned or funded by Academia Sinica, the results belong to Academia Sinica unless otherwise stipulated by law or contract. Another situation is if your research work is not conducted under the above conditions and does not use Academia Sinica’s resources, such as venues, equipment or experience. Unless otherwise stipulated by law or contract, the results belong to you. If you are conducting research that is not funded or entrusted by Academia Sinica and want to use the resources of Academia Sinica, you need to obtain the consent of your affiliated unit in advance and enter into a contract with Academia Sinica to stipulate the ownership of the research and development results and the distribution of equity income. If you have any questions about this situation, you can apply for recognition to the Research Council through your supervisor.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica

contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: If you work at Academia Sinica but do not use Academia Sinica’s resources, such as space or equipment, your research results will be your own, unless otherwise stipulated by law or contract.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: If the result has not been decided to apply for intellectual property rights, can I still apply on my own in the name of Academia Sinica?

Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, if Academia Sinica decides not to submit an application for intellectual property rights after evaluation, it can still allow you to apply on your own in the name of Academia Sinica. However, you need to bear all the fees required for the application, including maintenance fees after the rights are obtained. If a third party wants to negotiate technology transfer or licensing, you also need to notify Academia Sinica in a timely manner.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: What do I need to do once my IP application is approved?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: If your IPR application is approved, you need to notify Academia Sinica immediately. The Intellectual Property and Technology Transfer Office will then confirm whether the scope of your rights is consistent with the scope of previously reported R&D results. At the same time, they will evaluate the market value and application potential of this achievement and submit it to the Research and Management Committee for review. The research and management team will decide whether to compensate or share your costs based on market value, application potential and benefits, and determine related authorized promotion matters and revenue distribution ratios.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: If my R&D results have not been transferred or authorized, what will Academia Sinica do?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: If your R&D results belong to the intellectual property rights of Academia Sinica and have not been transferred or authorized for five years, Academia Sinica has two possible disposal methods. One possibility is that Academia Sinica will evaluate whether to continue paying fees or stop paying. Another possibility is that Academia Sinica will consider the opinions of you or your employer and decide whether to transfer this right to you or a third party with or without compensation.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: What fees will Academia Sinica stop paying if it cannot effectively use its research and development results?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: When the research and development results cannot be used effectively, Academia Sinica may decide to stop paying patent fees or maintenance fees.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: If I want to transfer my R&D results to others, will Academia Sinica agree?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: If you have research and development results that you want to transfer to others, Academia Sinica will first conduct an evaluation to see the practicality, possibility, and commercialization possibility of the results, etc. Then we will decide whether to approve your application based on the results of this evaluation. If after evaluation, Academia Sinica decides not to file an intellectual property application, they may allow you to file the application in the name of Academia Sinica. But in this case, you may need to bear the application fees and maintenance costs after you obtain the interest. These are things you need to consider.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: .If the application value and commercialization possibility of the results are not high after evaluation, how will Academia Sinica handle this situation?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: If, after evaluation, Academia Sinica believes that the application value and commercialization possibility of the R&D results are low, it may decide not to apply for intellectual property rights. However, if the creator still wants to apply, Academia Sinica can agree to let them apply in the name of Academia Sinica, but all application fees and maintenance costs after obtaining the rights must be borne by the creator. In addition, if a third party wants to negotiate the transfer or licensing of technology, the creator must notify Academia Sinica at any time.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: How is the equity income from Academia Sinica's R&D results distributed?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer:
After deducting necessary derivative expenses, 20% of the equity income from Academia Sinica’s R&D results will be allocated to the national treasury or funding agencies. Then, if the creators and the units or laboratories they belong to agree to participate in and receive equity income distribution, they can do so in the following ways:
Creators can receive up to 40% of net income if they wish.
Then the units and laboratories to which the creator belongs can share up to 10% of the net income if they wish.
It should be noted that if the units and laboratories to which the creator belongs participate in the allocation, if it is related to the development policy of the National Biotechnology Research Park and the Southern Campus and approved by Academia Sinica, there is no such restriction on the allocation they receive.
Then, the remaining amount after deducting the above distributions will belong to Academia Sinica.
In addition, if the creator no longer works at Academia Sinica, the equity income of the laboratory to which the creator belongs will be distributed to the unit responsible for managing that laboratory.
Moreover, the creator’s equity income can also be distributed to his related research team.
Other rights or interests, if they are not the above-mentioned equity income, belong to Academia Sinica.

contact:

answer: If you are a researcher at Academia Sinica, you can receive up to 40% of the net equity income based on your wishes.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: Can the research and development results of Academia Sinica be licensed to other government agencies or individuals for use?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer:
The R&D results of Academia Sinica can be licensed to other government agencies or to individuals for use, but they must comply with certain principles. First, in principle, this authorization is paid, non-exclusive and takes precedence within our national jurisdiction. However, if the authorization is free of charge, or is authorized to a foreign object, it must achieve certain goals, such as promoting scientific and technological development, prospering society, protecting national security, complying with international contracts, and not violating the principle of fairness. Furthermore, this free license may only be used for academic research, education or public welfare purposes. When licensing to foreign objects, it is also necessary to ensure that it will not have a significant negative impact on national security, domestic industrial competitiveness, or domestic technological and economic development.
As for "paid", it can be in the form of licensing fees, royalties, prices, equity, cross-licensing, technical cooperation or other industry-wide methods.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: When Academia Sinica transfers or authorizes the use of scientific and technological research and development results, what principles should it follow?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: When Academia Sinica transfers or authorizes scientific and technological research and development results, the first principles are to accept paid, non-exclusive and priority within our jurisdiction. If it is free of charge or authorized abroad, it must be ensured that it is done to promote scientific and technological development, social welfare, and national interests. It must also ensure the commercialization of research and development results and its intellectual property rights, safeguard national security, comply with international commitments, and do not violate The principle of fairness. In addition, free use should be limited to academic research, education, or public welfare purposes, and if licensed to foreign parties, it is necessary to ensure that doing so will not harm national security, domestic industrial competitiveness, or domestic technological and economic development. In addition, exclusive authorization to foreign objects also needs to meet certain conditions, for example, there is no suitable recipient in China. Compensatory methods may include licensing fees, royalties, prices, equity, mutual authorization, technical cooperation or other industry-wide methods.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica
question: What are the restrictions or requirements for the free use of Academia Sinica’s research and development results?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: If you want to use the research and development results of Academia Sinica for free, there will be some agreements. First, this free use must be for academic research, education or public welfare purposes. In addition, if the technology is licensed to foreign countries, the results of the research and development cannot be national core key technologies recognized by law. It must also be ensured that this authorization will not have a significant negative impact on our country's security, domestic industrial competitiveness, technology and economic development, or even if it will have a negative impact, it is acceptable if it is more conducive to the overall development of the country.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica

First of all, this research and development result cannot be a key national core technology. Secondly, licensing to foreign objects must not have a significant negative impact on national security, domestic industrial competitiveness, or domestic technological and economic development, unless doing so is more conducive to the overall development of the country. Finally, if you want to provide exclusive authorization to foreign objects, you need to confirm that there is no domestic object that is willing or able to take over this technology.

Secondly, licensing to foreign objects cannot have a significant negative impact on our country's security, domestic industrial competitiveness, technology and economic development, unless doing so is more beneficial to the overall development of our country. Finally, the authorized scientific research results cannot be our country’s core key technologies.

title: Attribution and application methods of scientific and technological research and development results of Academia Sinica

The paid methods may include licensing fees, royalties, prices, equity, mutual authorization or technical cooperation, etc.

Then you can contact the creators through a variety of methods, such as announcements on the website, press conferences, Contact information was seen in academic journals and newspapers. Then, depending on the circumstances and needs, Academia Sinica may sign a confidentiality agreement or a material transfer agreement with you, and ask you to fill in a negotiation summary form within one week after the first contact. If you are sure that you require exclusive authorization, the technical transfer personnel will make an exclusive authorization announcement. The announcement period is usually more than one week. Then when you propose conditions for authorization, you must provide legal establishment documents and development plans. At this stage, the convener of the research and management committee will appoint two members to review the contract content. The director of the Intellectual Property Division will approve the authorization conditions. title: Things to note when Academia Sinica authorizes the use of R&D results
question: When Academia Sinica's technology transfer personnel want to perform exclusive authorization for foreign companies, what procedures do they need to follow?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer:
Technical transfer personnel will follow a series of procedures when granting exclusive authorization to foreign businesses. First, they will prepare a marketing summary form and then publicly solicit authorized targets on the Intellectual Property Office's website. Secondly, they will contact interested parties through a variety of methods, including on the IP website, press conferences, academic journals or newspaper announcements, and other ways to let the public know.

Depending on the actual situation and needs, Academia Sinica can sign a confidentiality contract or material transfer contract with the intended authorized recipient. Within one week after being contacted, they need to fill out a "Negotiation Summary Form" and have it approved by the Director of the Intellectual Property Division.

Then when the subject requests exclusive authorization, the technology transfer personnel will publicly solicit exclusive authorization again, and the announcement period will be at least one week. When negotiating authorization conditions, they will require the other party to provide legal establishment documents and development plans.

The convener of the Research and Management Committee will then appoint one or two committee members to review the contents of the contract, and request the Director of the Intellectual Property Division to approve the authorization conditions. They will also attach legal establishment certification documents, authorization conditions and development plans, and send them to the research and management committee for review.

Once approved by the R&D Management Committee, the technology transfer personnel will begin to request the Academia Sinica for approval, and then proceed with the signing of the contract and subsequent payment requests based on the approval results.

title: Things to note when Academia Sinica authorizes the use of R&D results
question: How can they contact those interested in licensing?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: They have a variety of ways to contact those who are interested in licensing, such as announcing on the Intellectual Property Office's website, or at press conferences or in academic journals and newspapers. If there are other ways to let the public know, you can also consider using them.

title: Things to note when Academia Sinica authorizes the use of R&D results
question: If someone wants to undertake exclusive licensing, what steps do they need to go through?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer:
If someone wants to take over patent rights, first, they need to see our sales summary sheet, which we will announce on our IP page. In addition to website announcements, they can also contact us through conference announcements, academic journals, newspapers, or other publicly accessible methods.

Once they get in touch with us and have actual needs, we may sign a confidentiality contract or material transfer contract with them and submit a "Negotiation Summary Form". Then, they need to solicit patent authorization through an announcement when making a request for patent authorization. This announcement period will in principle last for one week.

During the process of negotiating authorization conditions, we will ask them to provide legal establishment documents and development plans. Afterwards, the convener of our research and management committee will assign one or two members to review the contract content and sign the request to the director of the Intellectual Property Department to approve the authorization conditions.

Next, they need to submit legal establishment certification documents, authorization conditions, development plans, and exclusive authorization contracts to the Research and Management Committee for review. If the R&D Management Committee approves the decision, the technology transfer personnel will request the Academia Sinica for approval. Finally, just follow the verification results to handle the signing seal and subsequent payment requests.

They will record the case immediately after learning the news and provide you with relevant procedures and documents for reference. The subsequent authorization process will be carried out in accordance with the regulations of Academia Sinica. You can participate in the promotion and negotiation of your R&D results, but you need to avoid the review or decision-making department related to the management or authorization to use your R&D results. You will also have to sign a licensing agreement, and if there is more than one creator, a representative will need to sign it. The identification of the creator's representative will be carried out in accordance with the patent application and maintenance regulations of Academia Sinica.

title: Things to note when Academia Sinica authorizes the use of R&D results
question: What relevant procedures and documents will the technical transfer personnel provide for my reference?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: After receiving your notice, the technical transfer personnel will immediately record the case, and then they will provide relevant procedures and documents for your reference to further understand how to authorize the R&D results. These may include some guidelines and document samples on the authorization process, which are all carried out in accordance with Academia Sinica's precautions for authorizing the use of research and development results. There will also be information on how to sign the authorization deed. If you have more than one creator, there are specific rules that determine who can sign on your behalf.

title: Things to note when Academia Sinica authorizes the use of R&D results
question: What should I avoid when it comes to promoting or negotiating my research and development?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: You should be careful not to participate in the review or decision-making of your own R&D results management or application cases.

title: Things to note when Academia Sinica authorizes the use of R&D results
question: When I need to sign a licensing agreement, if we have more than one creator, how do we decide who will sign the contract on our behalf?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: If there is more than one creator, one creator must sign the authorization contract on behalf of everyone. As for who will represent you, you have to decide according to the relevant regulations on patent application and maintenance work of Academia Sinica.

title: Things to note when Academia Sinica authorizes the use of R&D results
question: What are the relevant regulations on the key points of patent application and maintenance work of Academia Sinica that apply to the identification of creator representatives?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: This means that if there are more than two creators, you need to find one creator to sign the authorization contract on behalf of everyone. The method of selecting this representative must be based on the regulations of Academia Sinica when applying for patents and maintaining operations.

title: Things to note when Academia Sinica authorizes the use of R&D results
question: How are the precautions to be taken into account when authorizing the use of R&D results from Academia Sinica?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: The matters that need to be paid attention to when authorizing the use of R&D results of the Central Research Institute are approved by the Research and Management Committee meeting, then approved by the dean, and finally officially implemented. If there are any corrections in the future, it will be the same process.

title: Things to note when Academia Sinica authorizes the use of R&D results
question: Is the dean involved in determining the precautions for authorizing the use of these research and development results?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, the dean is indeed involved in approving the authorization for use of these research and development results.

title: Things to note when Academia Sinica authorizes the use of R&D results
question: If there are modifications to these licensing precautions, is the same procedure required?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, if these usage authorization precautions need to be revised, they will also need to be approved by the Research Management Committee meeting and then approved by the dean before implementation.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: How are the regulations for researchers from Academia Sinica to be seconded to for-profit enterprises?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: In order to enable researchers to cooperate with for-profit enterprises, Academia Sinica has formulated rules for researchers to be seconded to for-profit enterprises in accordance with Article 17 of the Basic Law on Science and Technology, which stipulates that scientific and technological manpower should be fully utilized. If there are certain situations where this regulation of the Academia Sinica is not clearly stipulated, then other legal provisions will be followed.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: If there are matters not specified in the operating instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to a for-profit enterprise, which laws should we follow?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: If there is no clear provision regarding the secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to a for-profit enterprise, we will handle it in accordance with other laws and regulations.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: These secondment provisions are to implement Article 17 of the Basic Law of Science and Technology. So what exactly does this law provide?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: This law actually requires full use of scientific and technological manpower. By seconding researchers to work in for-profit enterprises, their skills and knowledge can be used more widely. If there are no clear provisions in the operating instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises, we will refer to other relevant laws and regulations.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: What regulations should researchers from Academia Sinica pay attention to when they are seconded to work in for-profit enterprises?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: There are two regulations to note. The first is that the secondment recipients can only be for-profit enterprises that have signed a cooperative research project contract or technology licensing contract with Academia Sinica. Moreover, the secondment period must be within the validity period of both contracts. The second point is that the seconded researchers must be full-time permanent associate researchers at Academia Sinica or more senior researchers, and they need to devote all their time to specific positions or work in for-profit enterprises.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: What are the limits on the scope of seconding researchers to for-profit undertakings?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Researchers seconded to for-profit enterprises must be enterprises that have signed a cooperative research plan or technology license with Academia Sinica, and the secondment period must be within the validity period of these contracts. In addition, the scope of personnel who can be seconded is full-time permanent associate researchers or above at Academia Sinica, and they must work full-time in specific positions or jobs in for-profit enterprises.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: Which Academia Sinica researchers can be seconded to for-profit undertakings in specific roles?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Full-time, permanent associate researcher or above researchers at Academia Sinica can be seconded to hold specific positions in for-profit enterprises.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: Is there any time limit for applying for a secondment at Academia Sinica?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: There is a time limit for Academia Sinica to apply for secondment, and the secondment period must be within the validity period of the cooperative research project contract or technology licensing contract signed with Academia Sinica. In other words, the secondment period cannot exceed the validity period of the contract.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: Can secondees only hold specific positions or jobs in for-profit undertakings?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, the regulations of Academia Sinica are that seconded researchers can only hold specific positions or jobs in for-profit enterprises.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: What is the maximum period of secondment to a profit-making enterprise?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: The period of secondment to a profit-making enterprise can be up to three years.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: If the secondment period has expired but there is still need, can I apply for an extension?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, if the secondment period has expired but you still need it, you can apply for a one-year extension. However, it should be noted that the total secondment period cannot exceed three years while working at Academia Sinica.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: Will my position and grade at Academia Sinica be affected when I am seconded?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: No, your position and grade at Academia Sinica will not be affected by the secondment. In fact, when you are seconded, your seniority will still be calculated in accordance with current laws, and then the renewal or promotion process will be based on your original employment period.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: What laws will be used to calculate the length of service on secondment in a foreign profit-making enterprise?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: The number of years of service seconded to an outside profit-making enterprise will be calculated in accordance with current laws.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: Will my secondment period affect my renewal or promotion process?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: No, your secondment length will be calculated in accordance with current regulations, and your renewal and promotion procedures will be based on your original employment period.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: If I am a for-profit enterprise, how do I apply for secondment to researchers at Academia Sinica?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: If you are a for-profit enterprise and want to apply for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica, you first need to prepare a detailed plan, and then submit this plan to the unit where the person you want to second is working. Then, the application needs to be approved at a meeting of the unit or a central business meeting. Finally, the application needs to be reviewed by the Academia Sinica Conflict of Interest Management Committee to confirm that there is no conflict of interest, and then approved by the Academia Sinica before the secondment is officially granted. If you need to apply for an extension of secondment time, you must also follow the above steps.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: How does Academia Sinica’s Conflict of Interest Management Committee determine whether there is a conflict of interest?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: For a person to be seconded to a for-profit undertaking, the for-profit undertaking first needs to submit a detailed proposal application to the person's unit. Then, if the application is approved by a unit meeting or a center business meeting, it will be sent to the Conflict of Interest Management Committee of Academia Sinica for review. The Conflict of Interest Management Committee is here to review whether this application will cause a conflict of interest. If the result of the review is that there is no conflict of interest, the application will be sent to Academia Sinica for review, and a final determination will be made as to whether the secondment can be made. If you want to apply for an extended secondment, you need to go through the same process.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: In Academia Sinica, what are the office meetings and center business meetings? What is their role?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: In Academia Sinica, office meetings and central business meetings may be internal decision-making and discussion mechanisms. Their role is mainly to discuss and vote on various matters. The secondment to a for-profit enterprise mentioned here is an example. When a for-profit enterprise submits an application for secondment of personnel, it must first be approved by these meetings and then forwarded to the Academia Sinica Conflict of Interest Management Committee for further review. So it can be said that the office affairs meeting and the central business meeting play the role of preliminary review and filtering here.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: If researchers who have been seconded need to extend their secondment, how should they proceed?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: If a researcher is already on secondment but needs to extend the secondment period, he or she must first submit a detailed proposal to the relevant for-profit enterprise. Then, based on the plan, the unit needs to review and approve the application. After approval, the unit will send the application materials to the Conflict of Interest Management Committee of Academia Sinica. After this committee determines that there is no conflict of interest, Academia Sinica will review and decide whether to allow the secondment to be extended.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: Should the Academia Sinica staff seconded to a for-profit enterprise be suspended without pay first?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, Academia Sinica staff who are seconded to for-profit undertakings must first take a leave of absence without pay, and then the seconding institution will pay their salaries.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: Will the salary of the seconded personnel be paid by the seconding unit?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, the salary of the seconded personnel is paid by the seconding unit.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: If I am seconded, will my salary not be paid by Academia Sinica?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, if you are seconded, Academia Sinica will not pay your salary, but the seconding institution will be responsible for the payment.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: If I am a researcher working part-time as an administrative supervisor, do I need to apply for a part-time exemption before I can be seconded to a for-profit undertaking?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, you are a researcher who also serves as an administrative supervisor. If you want to be seconded to a for-profit enterprise, you need to apply for exemption from part-time job first.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: If I am an executive, do I need to resign from this position before I can be seconded to another company?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, if you are an executive, you will need to resign from this position before you can be seconded to another company.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: If I am in an executive role, can I be seconded directly to a for-profit business?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: No, you have to go through the formalities for exemption from part-time work before you can be seconded to a profit-making enterprise.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: I am an administrative supervisor. What procedures do I need to go through before being seconded to a profit-making enterprise?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: You need to go through the process of part-time exemption first, and then you can be seconded to a profit-making enterprise.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: How do I know the ownership and income distribution ratio of R&D results seconded to a for-profit enterprise?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: You can find out by looking at the secondment contracts between Academia Sinica and for-profit enterprises. In the contract, the attribution of R&D results and the income distribution ratio during the secondment period will be specified. The intellectual property rights and results of Academia Sinica will be handled according to the ownership and utilization methods of Academia Sinica’s scientific and technological research and development results.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: Are the results of researchers seconded to for-profit undertakings handled in accordance with Academia Sinica’s rules for the ownership and use of scientific and technological research and development results?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, the achievements of researchers during their for-profit undertakings will be handled in accordance with the ownership and utilization methods of scientific and technological research and development achievements set by Academia Sinica.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: Will Academia Sinica sign another secondment contract with a for-profit enterprise?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, Academia Sinica will sign a separate secondment contract with the for-profit enterprise.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: Which plan will be attached to the secondment contract?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: The secondment contract will be accompanied by a plan approved by Academia Sinica, Point 4 of the Instructions for Seconding Researchers from Academia Sinica to Profit-Profit Enterprises.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: Are all the intellectual property rights and results obtained by Academia Sinica agreed in the secondment contract owned by Academia Sinica?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: No, not all of Academia Sinica is owned by Academia Sinica in the secondment contract. The contract should stipulate the attribution of the R&D achievements of the seconded personnel and the distribution ratio of equity income during the secondment period. Only the parts belonging to Academia Sinica will be handled in accordance with the ownership and utilization methods of Academia Sinica’s development results.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: Can Academia Sinica personnel seconded to for-profit enterprises only do technology research and development and research projects?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, the main responsibility of Academia Sinica personnel seconded to for-profit enterprises is to participate in scientific research and development and research projects. However, under special circumstances, you can also do business-related work, but you must obtain special permission from Academia Sinica. If a person is found to have violated this rule during the secondment period, Academia Sinica will immediately terminate the secondment and require the person to return to their original job.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: If there are special circumstances, can researchers from Academia Sinica apply for commercial operation jobs?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, if there are special circumstances, researchers from Academia Sinica can apply to work in commercial operations, but the project needs to be submitted to the institute for approval.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: If the seconded researchers violate the regulations, will Academia Sinica immediately terminate the secondment and notify them to return to work?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, if the seconded researchers violate the regulations, Academia Sinica will immediately terminate the secondment and notify them to return to their original place.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: Can I apply for a research project during my secondment?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: No, you cannot apply for research projects during the secondment period, nor can you accept subsidies, commissions, or collaborative research projects from outside the hospital. However, this does not apply if your research project starts after the secondment period ends.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: If I already have a research project in progress before my secondment, what should I do during my secondment?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer:
If you already have a research project in progress before your secondment, the situation will be as follows:

First of all, if your project is an individual research project within Academia Sinica, you should suspend the execution of the project during your secondment. After your secondment is over and you return to Academia Sinica, you can continue to implement your plan according to Academia Sinica’s consent.

Secondly, if you serve as a host in other types of research projects within Academia Sinica, you need to change the host of the project.

Finally, if you serve as a leader in a project funded outside Academia Sinica or a research project commissioned or collaborated with others, you can choose to terminate the project, suspend the execution of the project, or change the project leader. Before you go on secondment, you need to prepare all the documents and have them reviewed by Academia Sinica within one month. Then, you need to operate according to the matters determined by Academia Sinica after review.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: If I am the project leader, how should the project proceed during my secondment?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: If you are on secondment and acting as program leader, there are a few things to note. First of all, if it is an individual research project within Academia Sinica, you should suspend the execution first. After the secondment is completed, you can only continue the execution if Academia Sinica agrees. Secondly, if you serve as a moderator on other types of research projects within Academia Sinica, you will need to change the project moderator. Finally, if you are leading a grant, commission, or collaborative research project outside of Academia Sinica, you should end the project, suspend execution, or change the project leader. One month before the secondment, you need to prepare relevant documents for review by Academia Sinica and implement them according to the decision of Academia Sinica.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: What should I do if I receive external subsidies or commission collaborative research projects during my secondment?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: If you accept subsidies, commissions or collaborative research projects from outside the hospital during your secondment, you must go through the process of ending the project, suspending the project or changing the project leader. You can choose one of these methods to handle it, and then you will be responsible for sorting out the relevant documents. One month before your secondment, the documents will be submitted to Academia Sinica for review. After that, you will complete the things approved by Academia Sinica.

title: Instructions for secondment of researchers from Academia Sinica to profit-making enterprises
question: What relevant documents do I need to prepare for review by Academia Sinica before secondment?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: You need to prepare all documents related to your research project. Especially if you are the project leader, you may need documents to apply for suspension of the project, termination of the project or change of project leader. These must be sent to Academia Sinica for review within one month before you are seconded. Handle matters based on their approval.

title: Key points for the management of income and expenses derived from intellectual property rights and achievements of Academia Sinica
question: How does Academia Sinica increase expenditures on scientific and technological research and development and effectively manage intellectual property rights and income from results?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Well, Academia Sinica mainly increases expenditures on science and technology research through their scientific research funds. As for how to manage intellectual property rights and income from results, they have a set of special regulations called key points for the management of income and expenses from intellectual property rights and income from results, which clearly provide them with how to operate and use them.

title: Key points for the management of income and expenses derived from intellectual property rights and achievements of Academia Sinica
question: May I ask how the scientific research funds of Academia Sinica are used to increase expenditures on scientific and technological research and development?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: The scientific research fund of Academia Sinica is mainly used for research and development expenditures on science and technology to enable further development of research. In addition, income generated from intellectual property rights and research results are also used to effectively manage. These are set according to the Academia Sinica's scientific research fund receipts and payments, storage and utilization methods.

title: Key points for the management of income and expenses derived from intellectual property rights and achievements of Academia Sinica
question: What regulations are based on the key points for the management of income and expenses derived from intellectual property rights and achievements of Academia Sinica?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: The key points for the management of income and expenditures from intellectual property rights and achievements of Academia Sinica are formulated in accordance with the provisions of Article 4, Paragraph 1, Paragraph 1 of the Measures for the Custody and Utilization of Income and Expenditure of Scientific Research Funds of Academia Sinica. This provision is mainly used for expenditures needed to promote scientific and technological research and development.

title: Key points for the management of income and expenses derived from intellectual property rights and achievements of Academia Sinica
question: What is "income" in the key points of income and expenditure management of intellectual property rights and results of Academia Sinica?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: "Income" here refers to the equity income from R&D results obtained by Academia Sinica in accordance with the regulations on the ownership and utilization of scientific and technological research and development results, as well as receipt of subsidies, commissions or investments from various agencies.

title: Key points for the management of income and expenses derived from intellectual property rights and achievements of Academia Sinica
question: How is technology transfer authorization defined?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Technology transfer authorization is to manage and use research and development results according to the provisions of scientific research methods.

title: Key points for the management of income and expenses derived from intellectual property rights and achievements of Academia Sinica
question: What are the principles governing Academia Sinica’s intellectual property rights and income from results?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer:
The management principle of Academia Sinica is to use the income derived from intellectual property rights and results for various purposes to promote scientific and technological research and development. This includes funding for setting up lectures, talent training, inviting scholars to visit, laboratory research and administrative related expenses, as well as intellectual property rights application, registration, promotion, maintenance and legal fees.

Not only that, but also the expenditures needed to promote international and cross-strait scientific and technological exchanges, improve the setup, expansion and upgrading of the research environment and assets, and recruit and retain outstanding talents. If necessary, it will also be used to pay statutory taxes or expenses, and other expenses related to technology transfer authorization.

As for the part belonging to Academia Sinica, it will be used for the purposes mentioned above, as well as the salaries of technology transfer authorized personnel, bonuses and other personnel expenses for performance personnel, handling the protection of intellectual property rights, expenses related to technology transfer and application business, and purchasing information. Expenditures such as equipment, books or intellectual property-related databases, as well as expenditures to promote basic research, applied research and technological development.

title: Key points for the management of income and expenses derived from intellectual property rights and achievements of Academia Sinica
question: What projects can these revenues be used to support?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: This income can be used to support many things. For example, setting up lectures, looking for talents, and inviting scholars from home and abroad to visit. It can also be used to pay for expenses related to laboratory research and administration, as well as fees for the application, registration, promotion and maintenance of intellectual property rights, and even the appointment fees of professionals. You can also pay for the legal fees and appointment of professionals to protect intellectual property rights, as well as the costs of setting up, expanding and upgrading the research environment and assets. The costs of international scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation can also be paid by income, including the costs of scientific and technological exchanges and cooperation with mainland China. In addition, there are taxes or other expenses to be paid, as well as the cost of finding and retaining talent, and other expenses that contribute to technology transfer authorization. For the part belonging to Academia Sinica, it can also be used to pay for all the things mentioned above, as well as the salaries and bonuses of staff who handle technology transfer authorization, and even other personnel expenses, as well as related expenses for handling intellectual property rights protection, technology transfer and application business. You can also spend money to buy information equipment, books, or intellectual property-related databases. Finally, it can also drive spending on basic research, applied research and technology development.

title: Key points of equity management operations of Academia Sinica’s research and development results
question: What are the key points of Academia Sinica’s equity management work?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer:
The key points of Academia Sinica's equity management operations are mainly to manage the equity obtained from research and development results and improve efficiency. It is mainly led by the Intellectual Property Office, and will also be assisted by the General Affairs Office, the Accounting Office and the Legal Affairs Office. The Intellectual Property Office regularly updates the stock register and shareholding details, and manages equity according to business status.

For the equity of profit-making enterprises in operation, the Intellectual Property Office will regularly check the status and stock price, and attend shareholder meetings to update information. If Academia Sinica holds more than 10% of the equity, it will also make a declaration in accordance with regulations. There will be similar management methods for foreign profit-making enterprises.

For equity interests in profit-making enterprises that are closed, the Intellectual Property Office will contact them every six months to find out whether they have plans to reopen.

Finally, Academia Sinica will regularly review the equity management situation through the review committee, and when faced with major decisions, such as dissolution, merger or split, the review committee will decide the procedures.

title: Key points of equity management operations of Academia Sinica’s research and development results
question: What role does the Intellectual Property Office play in equity management?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer:
The Intellectual Property Office plays the main responsible role in the equity management of Academia Sinica. They are responsible for handling matters related to equity management, such as signing reports and reviews. For example, when the Academia Sinica acquires equity interests in profit-making enterprises due to its management and application of research and development results, the Intellectual Property Division needs to keep separate accounts of the stocks of these profit-making enterprises and update the securities holding details every three months.
The Intellectual Property Office must also manage the equity according to the operating status of the profit-making enterprise, and conduct different operations depending on whether it is a domestic or foreign profit-making enterprise. They are required to hold internal meetings every six months to discuss matters related to equity management.
On the whole, the Intellectual Property Office plays the main execution and monitoring role in the equity management process of Academia Sinica.

title: Key points of equity management operations of Academia Sinica’s research and development results
question: What responsibilities do the General Affairs Office and the Accounting Office have in equity management?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: The General Affairs Office and the Accounting Office have different important tasks in equity management. The General Affairs Office is mainly responsible for handling the storage of equity-related documents, the change of authorized agents and maintenance of trading accounts, and stock cancellation and other matters. The accounting office is responsible for handling equity-related accounting audits. In addition, when Academia Sinica acquires equity interests in profit-making enterprises due to its management and application of research and development results, the Intellectual Property Office will independently file the stocks of these profit-making enterprises and update the securities holding details every three months to the General Affairs Office and Accounting Office.

title: Key points of equity management operations of Academia Sinica’s research and development results
question: How will the equity obtained from the use of research and development results be managed?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Academia Sinica will be responsible for managing the equity obtained from the application of research and development results through the Intellectual Property Office. Other relevant units, such as the General Affairs Office, Accounting Office and Legal Affairs Office, will also assist in handling related matters. If necessary, the Intellectual Property Office can invite professional institutions, legal persons or groups to assist in equity management. They will record the stocks of each profit-making enterprise independently and update the securities holding details every three months. The Intellectual Property Office will classify each profit-making enterprise according to its operating status and then manage it separately. They will keep in regular contact with these profit-making enterprises, frequently check their operating status, and attend shareholder meetings if necessary. Finally, the Equity Disposal Review Committee will meet once a year to review equity management matters.

title: Key points of equity management operations of Academia Sinica’s research and development results
question: What does an IP office need to do to manage equity?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: The work of the Intellectual Property Office is mainly related to equity management, including the management and use of equity obtained from research and development results of Academia Sinica. They need to keep separate registers of the stocks of each profit-making enterprise, and update the details of securities to the General Affairs Office and the Accounting Office every three months. The Intellectual Property Office also manages each business based on its status (such as whether it is operating, closed, or dissolved). If they are operating profit-making enterprises, the IP office needs to keep in constant contact with them, regularly check their operational status, and attend their shareholder meetings. If the company's shares held by Academia Sinica exceed 10% of the total amount, the Intellectual Property Office must report it in accordance with the relevant provisions of the Securities and Exchange Act. For profit-making businesses that are closed, the Intellectual Property Office will contact them every six months to ask if they have any plans to reopen. The Intellectual Property Office also needs to hold internal meetings every six months to review and discuss all reports.

As for the preliminary review of the equity disposal plan, Academia Sinica will invite two to three accountants or other professionals to serve as preliminary review committee members based on the nature of the case to conduct a substantive review of the equity disposal plan, and then send the opinions of the preliminary review committee members to the review committee for review.

title: Things that Academia Sinica should pay attention to when handling various matters related to equity income from scientific and technological research and development results
question: How is equity income distributed?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer:
The distribution of equity income is mainly responsible for the Intellectual Property and Technology Transfer Division. First, when they receive notification that equity income has been remitted to Academia Sinica’s cash account, they will confirm whether the amount is the same as stipulated in the contract. If they receive a check, they will ask the General Affairs Office to handle check deposit, accounting and cashier-related matters after counting it. They will also ask the Controller's Office to handle accounting-related matters.

In terms of distribution, the Intellectual Property and Technology Transfer Office handles the signing matters in accordance with regulations. After approval, the creator's representative, the creator's unit and the accounting office will be notified. After receiving the distribution notice, the unit to which the creator belongs must handle tax withholding, supplementary health insurance and other matters in accordance with the provisions of tax laws and national health insurance, and issue a withholding voucher to the creator within the legal period.

Finally, the Intellectual Property and Technology Transfer Office will sort out the amount paid every quarter and notify the National Science and Technology Development Fund Management Committee of the Executive Yuan of the detailed list and remittance information. If it is a funding agency, they will apply for remittance or attach a check issued by the General Affairs Office, and pay and notify according to the regulations of each funding agency. Payment amounts and other information will also be compiled and controlled every quarter.

title: Things that Academia Sinica should pay attention to when handling various matters related to equity income from scientific and technological research and development results
question: If I am a creator at Academia Sinica, what should I pay attention to when distributing equity?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer:
There are several things you should pay attention to. First, the equity is collected and managed by the Intellectual Property and Technology Transfer Office. The equity received will be requested to the accounting office to handle relevant accounting matters. Then, the equity will be allocated to you, the treasury or the funding agency according to regulations. After the allocation is completed, all relevant information such as the transfer price per share will be notified to you and the unit to which you belong.

In addition, the transfer of equity also requires attention. You will receive a notification containing information such as the number of shares and the amount of securities tax to be paid. You need to provide relevant documents to the IFT Office to handle transfer-related matters. After the transfer is completed, you will receive notifications about equity-related information. If the equity is transferred to the treasury or funding agency, these units will also receive relevant notifications.

Finally, at the same time, you should also pay related fees such as withholding taxes and supplementary health insurance premiums within the time limit in accordance with tax laws and National Health Insurance regulations.

In principle, equity distribution is completed in one go. If there is another agreement, it can be distributed in installments. So, if this happens, you have to follow the agreement.

Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer: Yes, after the equity transfer is transferred to you, the Intellectual Property Technology Transfer Office will inform you and your unit of the equity-related information of the completed transfer.

title: Things that Academia Sinica should pay attention to when handling various matters related to equity income from scientific and technological research and development results
question: How are the procedures related to equity transfer carried out?
contact:
Intellectual Property Division, Academia Sinica
2787-2554
ip@gate.sinica.edu.tw
answer:
The Intellectual Property Transfer Office will first notify each creator of the number of shares to be allocated and the amount of securities tax to be paid, and will collect the relevant transfer documents to handle the printing matter. After the equity is transferred to the creator, the Intellectual Property and Technology Transfer Office will notify the creator and the creator's unit of relevant information. Then, the Intellectual Property and Technology Transfer Office will send the transfer-related documents to the national treasury or funding agencies to handle the sealing matters. When the equity is transferred to the treasury or funding agency, the Intellectual Property and Technology Transfer Office will notify the treasury or funding agency of the equity-related information upon completion of the transfer.

On the other hand, after the creator's unit receives the transfer letter from the Intellectual Property Transfer Office, it will deliver the securities tax receipts and stocks to the creator for retention. Then, in accordance with the relevant provisions of tax laws and national health insurance, the creator's employer will pay the withholding tax and supplementary health insurance premiums within the time limit, and issue a withholding voucher to the creator within the legal period. The equity will generally be allocated once, but if Academia Sinica and the creator have other agreements, the equity will be allocated according to the agreement.
